game.name: Timber Fever
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Cut down an infinitely tall Tree and defeat its Protectors. Timber Fever is an action, incremental, roguelike where you create chaos by cutting down the Tree of Life using wacky tools.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cut down an infinitely tall Tree and defeat its Protectors. Timber Fever is an action, incremental, roguelike where you create chaos by cutting down the Tree of Life using wacky tools.
